TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScriptMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ScriptMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ScriptMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定用于调用方法的 HTTP 谓词以及响应的格式。

span.span: Specifies which HTTP verb is used to invoke a method, and the format of the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定可以从客户端脚本调用的方法的信息。This attribute is used to specify information for methods that can be called from client script. 该属性允许您指定的 HTTP 谓词 （GET 或 POST） 可用于调用方法。The attribute lets you specify which HTTP verb (GET or POST) can be used to invoke a method. 它还允许你指定的响应是否通过使用 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 或 XML 格式。It also lets you specify whether the response is formatted by using either JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) or XML. 属性是可选项。The attribute is optional. (但是，可以从客户端脚本调用的方法必须具有应用的属性。)。(However, methods that can be called from client script must have the attribute applied.). 如果方法不使用标记、 使用 HTTP POST 命令将调用方法和响应将序列化为 JSON。If a method is not marked with , the method will be called by using the HTTP POST command and the response will be serialized as JSON. 不能重写此设置从脚本。You cannot override this setting from script. 只采用命名参数。 takes only named parameters. 以下是的属性可以用作命名参数的类：The following are the properties of the class that can be used as named parameters: - 指定是否将使用 HTTP GET 命令调用该方法。Specifies whether the method will be invoked by using the HTTP GET command. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置属性`true`可能会带来安全风险，你的应用程序，如果你正在使用敏感数据或事务。Setting the property to `true` might pose a security risk for your application if you are working with sensitive data or transactions. 在 GET 请求中，消息为 URL 编码由浏览器，因此更容易遭到篡改。In GET requests, the message is encoded by the browser into the URL and is therefore an easier target for tampering. 对于 GET 和 POST 请求，应遵循安全指导原则来保护敏感数据。For both GET and POST requests, you should follow security guidelines to protect sensitive data. - 指定为 JSON 或 XML，是否将序列化响应。Specifies whether the response will be serialized as JSON or as XML. 默认值为 `Json`。The default is `Json`. 属性可用于将 XML 指定为返回类型，该方法返回时或对象。The property is useful to specify XML as the return type when the method returns an or an object. - 指定是否所有的返回类型，包括字符串类型扩展会序列化为 XML。Specifies whether all return types, including string types, are serialized as XML. 值响应序列化为 JSON 时，将忽略属性。The value of the property is ignored when the response is serialized as JSON. 有关如何使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about how to use attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用到`GetXmlDocument`和`EchoStringAndDate`方法以指定要使用并指定响应格式的 HTTP 谓词。The following example shows how to apply to the `GetXmlDocument` and `EchoStringAndDate` methods to specify which HTTP verb to use and to specify the response format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Script::Services::ResponseFormat ResponseFormat { System::Web::Script::Services::ResponseFormat get(); void set(System::Web::Script::Services::ResponseFormat value); };
member this.ResponseFormat : System.Web.Script.Services.ResponseFormat with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置方法响应的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the format of the method response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用当你想要指定为返回类型的格式的 XML 时，属性。Use the property when you want to specify XML as the format for the return type. 这是有用的该方法返回时或对象。This is useful when the method returns an or an object. 当属性设置为`Xml`，公共字段和属性的返回类型具有应用属性不会被忽略。When the property is set to `Xml`, the public fields and properties of the return type that have the attribute applied will not be ignored. 这是因为它们将使用序列化对象而不是对象。This is because they will be serialized by using the object instead of the object. 您必须首先应用特性使忽略，或跳过，这些公共字段和属性的返回类型。You must apply the attribute to make ignore, or skip, those public fields and properties of the return type. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用属性设为与某一 Web 方法属性设置为`Xml`。The following example shows how to apply the attribute to a Web method with the property set to `Xml`. 将序列化为 XML 的方法的返回值，并且将其作为类型的对象发送给成功的回调函数。The return value of the method will be serialized as XML and sent to the succeeded callback function as an object of type . 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseHttpGet { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseHttpGet : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否通过使用 HTTP GET 调用方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to invoke the method by using HTTP GET.

value.span: 如果通过使用 HTTP GET 命令调用方法，则为 ；如果通过使用 HTTP POST 命令调用方法，则为 。

span.span: if the method is invoked by using the HTTP GET command; if the method is invoked by using the HTTP POST command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能重写从 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 客户端上的此属性。You cannot override this property from ECMAScript (JavaScript) on the client. 如果此属性设置为`true`，调用方法中的，从脚本将始终需要使用 HTTP GET。If this property is set to `true`, invoking the method from script will always use HTTP GET. 当此属性设置为`true`，客户端代理代码使用 HTTP GET 调用 Web 服务。When this property is set to `true`, the client proxy code uses HTTP GET to call the Web service. 方法中的每个输入的参数将显示为用于调用 Web 方法的 URL 中的查询参数。Each input parameter for the method appears as a query parameter in the URL that is used to invoke the Web method. 通过 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 序列化和 URL 编码的参数值获取参数值。The parameter value is obtained through JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) serialization and URL encoding of the parameter value. 用于的 HTTP GET 调用 Web 服务方法遵循用于任何其他 Web 交互相同的准则。The use of HTTP GET for invoking the Web service method follows the same guidelines for any other Web interaction. 应仅用于操作使用 HTTP GET，未公开任何敏感的数据和服务器操作没有副作用时。HTTP GET should be used only for operations where no sensitive data is exposed and when the server action does not have side effects. > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置属性`true`可能会带来安全风险，你的应用程序，如果你正在使用敏感数据或事务。Setting the property to `true` might pose a security risk for your application if you are working with sensitive data or transactions. 在 GET 请求中，消息为 URL 编码由浏览器，因此更容易遭到篡改。In GET requests, the message is encoded by the browser into the URL and is therefore an easier target for tampering. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用到具有的 Web 方法属性设置为`true`。The following example shows how to apply to a Web method with the property set to `true`. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool XmlSerializeString { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.XmlSerializeString : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将所有返回类型都序列化为包含字符串类型的 XML。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all return types are serialized as XML, which includes string types.

value.span: 如果所有返回类型都序列化为 XML，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all return types are serialized as XML; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`false`，所有返回类型扩展会序列化为 XML，字符串，将被解释为 XML 标记除外。When this property is set to `false`, all return types are serialized as XML, except string, which is interpreted as XML markup. 如果值为`false`，并且如果返回类型是一个字符串，并且如果字符串不包含对应于格式正确的 XML 文档的 XML 标记，成功的回调函数将调用但是所生成序列化的字符串将`null`.If the value is `false`, and if the return type is a string, and if the string does not contain XML markup that corresponds to a well-formed XML document, the succeeded callback function will be invoked but the resulting serialized string will be `null`. 值时，将忽略属性设置为`Json`。The value of is ignored when the property is set to `Json`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用到具有的 Web 方法属性设置为`true`。The following example shows how to apply to a Web method with the property set to `true`. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
